>> Ok, so what is a test? Is a test an assertEquals() method 
>call or is i=
t 
>> a testXXX() method?
>
>A test is an assertion that might fail indepen=
dently of other 
>assertions.
>
>If a group of assertions is needed to show=
 that a behavior is correct, 
>such making sure a stack actually tracks all=
 its elements, 
>then that is 
>one test.

I like that. As many assertions =
as it takes to prove one behaviour.

><opinion>Most of the time, each asser=
tion is a test.</opinion>

Except when they're not. ;-)

>J. B. Rainsberger=
,

Simon
